nodes.text: The Model 608 Mega'puter was a computer produced by NeuroSaav during the Galactic Civil War.

A large number of Model 608 Mega'puters were installed in Gopsthal, the main administrative district of the planet Woostri. As a result, much of the planet became computer-controlled. Everything from landspeeder maintenance to traffic control to housekeeping was droid- or computer-directed, and as a result Woostoids had a large amount of free time.
